title: denis.code.forever
author: denis.code.forever
content: Hello thereDid someone tried to post at https://ngnrt.com/ ?Â  The platforms allow the users to mine bitcoins from their posts.  Has someone actually tried it? How many bitcoin can you obtain from your not so original posts?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: It will be better for you to disable that link, it is a fake link. You can leave it as https: //ngnrt[dot]com/The site was just created:Code:Registered On:2022-06-08Expires On:2023-06-08Updated On:2022-06-08People should stay away from that site or they will be scammed. How can someone mine bitcoin from posts? That is not possible.

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: that's a scam. Money can't be given for free and they were only attracting people by using the word of giving bitcoin as reward for posting. They will never pay you and it's also scam. they are only looking for the free traffic. Don't be fooled with this kind of fake promotion. There are so many scam sites were doing the same thing as well to attract people and then they will be abandon their users once their target already achieved.
